9
Step 2: Onto-BD Mapping (R2O)
R2O is a language for expliciting procedural mappings between 
relational models and ontologies. (model – model)
ODEMapster is a compiler that cans execute mappings for:
– carrying out ontology population (DB → ontology)
– responsing queries to ontology with DB information
 
(ontology → DB → ontology)
column4  column5
conceptmap-def
   name Cliente
   identified-by Usuarios.ID
   uri-as
      <transformation>
   applies-if
      <cond-expr>
   joins-via
      <cond-expr>
   documentation ”Correspondence description”
